value.name: Northumbria Police fine 137 and arrest four for Covid breaches
value.description: Assistant Chief Constable Scott Hall said: “We all need to work together to tackle this deadly virus and we are grateful to the overwhelming majority of people who are sticking to the rules.

value.name: Man charged in gender reveal blast that rocked nearby towns

value.name: Kosovo police seize record cocaine shipment, arrest 7
value.description: Kosovo police seized a record 400 kilograms (880 pounds) of cocaine that originated in Brazil, and arrested seven people suspected of drug trafficking offenses, authorities

value.name: Law enforcement reports for May 11-12
value.description: Charlotte Frasier, 98, beloved mother, grandmother, and great-grandmother, was called to her eternal resting place on May 21, 2021. She was born March 9, 1923, to Robert Lee and Harriett Holifield in Meridian,

value.name: Steph almost comes out of his jersey after 9th 3-pointer
value.description: Steph almost comes out of his jersey after 9th 3-pointer Steph Curry can't hold back his excitement as he drills another triple to extend the Warriors' lead over the Grizzlies.
